account.title: My Account
account.subtitle: Manage your profile and preferences
account.dataInfo: Your data is stored securely on your device. You can export or delete it at any time.

exportData.description: Download all your data as a JSON file. You can use this for backups or to transfer your data.

account.logoutDescription: Are you sure you want to logout? This will clear all your data from this device. If you have cloud backup enabled, your data will be preserved and you can sign in again to restore it.
account.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all your data? This cannot be undone.

recoveryKit.whatsIncluded: What's included: QR code, backup code, user ID, and recovery instructions
recoveryKit.securityNote: Store this PDF in a safe place - it contains your account credentials

pdf.title: Logikids Recovery Kit
pdf.subtitle: Save this document to recover your account
pdf.qrLabel: Scan this QR code to restore your account
pdf.instructionsTitle: How to Use This Recovery Kit:
pdf.instruction1: 1. Keep this document in a safe place
pdf.instruction2: 2. To restore your account, scan the QR code or enter the backup code
pdf.instruction3: 3. Your account data is encrypted - this recovery kit is needed to decrypt it
pdf.instruction4: 4. Anyone with this recovery kit can access your account
pdf.securityWarning1: This recovery kit contains your encryption key. Keep it secure and private.
pdf.securityWarning2: Never share it or upload it to cloud services.

qrDisplay.showButton: Show QR Code for Device Pairing
qrDisplay.scanInstruction: Scan this code on another device to sync your account
qrDisplay.securityWarning: This QR code contains your account credentials. Only scan it on devices you trust.

import.backupCodeHint: Paste the backup code from your recovery kit PDF
import.invalidCodeError: Invalid backup code. Please check and try again.
import.conflictMessage: This device already has account data. Importing will replace all existing data with the imported account.
import.conflictWarning: Make sure to download your current recovery kit first if you want to keep this data.

accountNotFound.title: Time for a Fresh Start!
accountNotFound.message1: Your previous account needs to be reset due to recent updates during our beta phase.
accountNotFound.message2: Ready to start fresh? You'll need a new invite code to continue your learning journey!
accountNotFound.note: This will clear your local data

settings.title: Settings
settings.syncDescription: Automatically backup your data to the cloud
